website_summaries.verdict: The AOC Q2963PM brings ultra-wide display capabilities to your desktop at an affordable price. It offers a wealth of video ports and reasonably good performance but its vertical viewing angle performance needs work.

customer_reviews.title: Great for wall-mounting too! Great VESA setup.
customer_reviews.text: Every other review was spot on. This is a great monitor. What stands out is the stand/mounting ability. If you're looking to mount this to a VESA mount, this is by far the coolest most versatile setup I've ever seen. The base is removable, and you're left with an articulating "control center" that houses the vesa mount and all the power/video connections. It's really fantastic. Most of the IPS monitors we tried didn't even have the VESA holes. This not only had them, but provided an extra range of motion in addition to that of the mounting arm.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has a few minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it has a few minor issues. First of all it leaves a ghost image if you play a video, of the size of the last video played. for about 4 seconds. Not a big problem but a little annoying. It should have come with 2 HDMI inputs, it didn't. I had to adapt a cable to another input to be able to plug in another hd device. Again annoying but not a deal killer. The image quality is very good! Menu is simple enough. I would recommend it but I might get the more expensive name brand model if I did it again. I hope this company does another one with a bit more connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I see more things (other than dead people). This works pretty well on applications I run, especially when it comes to creating and editing images as well as wider work space. They come out nice and clear. What I wasn't expecting is that it's a lot more clearer now when I game, especially Skyrim. Although I had to download and install Flawless Wide to experience the game in 21:9, but overall I can see things in the game in much better detail. If it makes Skyrim look this good, I have no doubt it'll look just as awesome on my other games.
customer_reviews.author: JSA3D

customer_reviews.title: Great, but some software issues...
customer_reviews.text: The aspect ratio is something to get used to, and the Screen+ feature seems to be non-functional in Win 8.1. Otherwise, it is great, if a bit short on the vertical. I wish it was about 2" taller, but then I guess it would be a 31-32" and more expensive. I have 260 icons on my desktop (don't counsel me on my desktop - i like it that way), and this allows me to have them all on there with decent sized icons and font size. Most modern games can figure it out, and it makes some games (like Civ V) really amazing. I can see so much more real estate than with my other, conventional ratio, monitor.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY AOC BRAND! You should buy ACER or HANNSPREE!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was great when I first got it but as time went on the screen started to get blue lines going across the screen. Upon contacting Customer Service they stated the warranty for the LED Screen is only 1 year, vs the full warranty which is 3 years. I could pay to ship it back to them and they can see if it is the LED, which if it is I would have to pay all the fee's associated with it. Such a waste of money to buy a product and then get thrown back in your face that they won't help you fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wide Screen Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful image and colors. Great for working on CAD, watching movies, or playing games. Variable aspect ratio flexibility makes it versatile and fun to use. Some users have criticized its limited range of adjustment for vertical viewing, but it works well for me. The monitor is wide enough that I don't want it closer than about 30" away, so vertical tilt is ideal. The cost was super reasonable for an IPS monitor with lots of trending features and connections. I like the base because it takes up very little room on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Discounted Price + Excellent Resolution and Function
customer_reviews.text: After completing my research, I chose this monitor to match up with my Mac Mini -- I donated two 20" crappy HP monitors, and this AOC 29" was their replacement. I chose well.... The resolution on this is perfect for me and its function clearly demonstrates itself when opening spreadsheets or multi-tasking between programs. Finally, this price was much, much lower (and throw in the free shipping) than other online and brick/mortar competitors...
customer_reviews.author: dano0726

customer_reviews.title: Terrific monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as an external monitor for my rather limited in display real estate MacBook and I could not wish for a better monitor. Especially for the price. The only "problem" I have is that the on screen menus for the setup especially if you want side by side (two computers connected to the monitor, one displaying on the right side, the other one on the left side) are not very clear what is what and how to exactly set it up. That takes some fiddling. But that little niggle aside I prefer this monitor over its taller cousins. Just make sure that your graphics card can deal with the somewhat exotic 21:9 setup, not all can.
customer_reviews.author: Pleschu

customer_reviews.title: Nice display, sub optimal stand
customer_reviews.text: All around good monitor, only gripe is having to press the power button twice to power it off. Other than that no complaints, colors look good, motion looks good. Oh yeah another gripe,with the back of the stand against a wall the front of the screen is 7 inches from wall, sucking up precious desktop real estate, forcing me to get some kind of low profile wall mount or some such thing.
customer_reviews.author: 14Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective high end monitor - 29 inch screen
customer_reviews.text: I love my new monitor. It is high quality - I still have a vga color AOC monitor for 10 yrs still works on my programming PC. This new monitor is fabulous colors, simple setup and has many options. Cable connections are finally setup with a ease and expandability for plugging in other devices in the future. Low wattage consumption. PDF manual is very easy to find information. Your price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Not all games play well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for almost a year now on my primary gaming machine. I love it. Not all games play well with the 21:9 aspect ratio but I've always figured something out with a little research and effort. I'll never be able to go back to the 16:9 setup. Even when I'm not playing games its so convenient to have TWO side by side 4:3 windows open when I'm actually doing some work. The color and clarity on this monitor is still pleasing and noticeable after 11 months of use. Great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: johnnydex

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Still the best monitor for my money. Wider is better than taller for a desktop monitor. Can have two full windows open and work comfortably. Turn off the energy saving feature though because it dims and changes things in the middle of doing work and gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rosendaul

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and nice functionality
customer_reviews.text: I had no issue with dead pixels on this monitor. The dual input feature worked well (though I had to adjust my resolutions to 4:3 ratios to avoid image stretching. I haven't messed around with the settings enough to see if it can letterbox 16: on the dual inputs. Otherwise, It beats having a dual monitor setup for a single source usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dolemite Liao

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but needed to change a few setting around ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor but needed to change a few setting around to produce a more vivid picture. The blacks are perfect and solors are very accurate with a little tweaking. Even on default setting it was a good picture. Physically I am not a fan that the picture does not go to the corners. I first thought it was a scaling issue but you can tell where the screen stops
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So if you want to go big and wide this is the bomb. I'm an avid gamer and this mates well with my Alienware PC. While not all games truly support (just stretches rather than actually wider) this aspect ratio it's still a great for all around gameplay. For web browsing and blue ray movies it's awesome. I'd recommend it and while I had some worries after reading some of the reviews it turned out to be unfounded. Bright, crisp screen with no dead pixels. For the price I think it would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rand

customer_reviews.title: OK screen with terrible dot pitch
customer_reviews.text: While the extra screen size is good, the images are muddy. Text is not smooth and becomes hard to look at quickly. This looks/feels like technology from 2005. Updated: Still not thrilled and will be returning the monitor; but I thought I should mention that video looks pretty good, so if you are going to use this as a TV or just to watch stuff it might be OK
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for work at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and have to have multiple windows open at a time sometimes 4 or 5 and this monitor makes my life so much easier. I can have them all on one screen open to a point where i can read everything i need. The only drawback is the inability to raise and lower it, as it only sits about 2 inches off the desk, you really cant place anything in front of it and still be able to see ( like if you are using a laptop you had better have a large desk )
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Zarb

customer_reviews.title: What's better than one AOC Ultrawide? Two of them side by side of couse. :-)
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 4 24 inch Acer Screens with two of these Monsters and wall-mounted them. The Resolution is great, tons of Room for Apps, displays Blu-Rays fine, no problems after years of Service. Very easy to use. You'll never look back after using one of these Monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Snowblind

customer_reviews.title: MultiPlay a Farce and Impractical At That, But Monitor Still Well Worth Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not as useful as I'd thought -- for example, "MultiPlay" isn't an actual setting or toggle you can switch to: it's just AOC's marketing department making a big deal out of the fact that three programs could be windowed side-by-side for increased productivity (though in practice even two windows barely work out successfully, depending on just what you're trying to do, exactly) -- but a beautiful display all the same, and the price is even more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Foreigner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor and great color. My old 23" monitor (AOC also) had really crappy color and contrast, but it was cheap. This thing blows it away, I love the aspect ratio. Make sure you use the included DVI cable. My old cable would not display properly at 2560x1080 although it worked fine for 1920x1080. After I freaked out I though I would try the cable it came with and voila...it worked great. Gaming on this thing is awesome. I'll update in a few weeks if I have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mansu

customer_reviews.title: nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: i can open my programs fully and do a lot more because of its width. great color. one complaint and this may be just me, but i hate it when the monitor controls the sound -- i have my own speakers hooked up but the monitor controls the volume. it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best ultra-wide bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor-- beautiful picture quality with all of the connections I need. Very slick-looking to boot. Controls are slightly clunky, but work just fine once you get the hang of it. I wish there was an easy way for me to switch between single and dual monitor mode, but for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: momentarydogma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The AOC is everything it's advertised to be. I have limited desktop space so the use of dual monitors, will very nice, required more desktop real estate than I had to provide in my home office. I can easily have Outlook open in one half or this monitor while utilizing the other half to remotely accessing a server. I necessary, I have had three windows open side by side. It was easy to set up and the picture looks fantastic. I've watched a few movies on it and have no complaints. For me, I have the benefit of two monitors while only taking up the desk space of one.
customer_reviews.author: GoVertical

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Wide is where it's at
customer_reviews.text: I never knew what I was missing as a video editor not having a ultra wide monitor. I used to use 2 monitor for everything, but now I can accomplish the same goals with just one monitor. The inputs on this are great and the ability to use it as 2 monitors at once is an added feature I don't use, but was a selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nrogers319

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Except the cheap plastic aspect used for the monitor I don't see any other negative point. To be fully honest, I have dead pixels in a corner... It is a little bit disappointing but it is not really annoying (it's explained the -1 star). Except that, the color, the image quality and the very wide ratio of this monitor are very pleasant. Before, I had a 27'' monitor and I prefer this one. I use my computer for many tasks: Internet, writing, dev, game...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars due to lack of height adjustment but great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and spend 10 hours looking at the screen, I got tired of spending time clicking from one window to the next to see all my documents. Not a problem with this monitor. The monitor tilts but the height does not adjust, and so I have to prop it up.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. T.

customer_reviews.title: If you want WOW factor this is your new favorite monitor
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, I'm really impressed with thing. I haven't enjoyed that WOW factor with a new monitor in many years. This is the perfect form, size, function, and price point. I mounted it onand now I can rotate this vertical for the ultimate PDF manual readings! Install the free iRotate utility (google it) if the normal Ctrl Alt Arrows don't work. (Windows) So yeah this thing is the perfect single monitor with the dual monitor feeling. Note that you only get 2560 x 1080 with DisplyPort connections. You are limited to 1920 x 1080 via HDMI or HDMI-DisplayPort adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: made of wet tissue paper
customer_reviews.text: really an alright monitor, up until my lighter had fallen off my desk and when i threw it back up onto my desk it bumped the monitor and destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: great monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor takes some getting use to, but I'm starting to love it. My only complaint is the monitor only comes with vga and hdmi cable. with hdmi cable, the text is too small, I bought a dvi dual link monitor cable, and now it looks fine. text and icons are perfect size and easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: mfmayes49

customer_reviews.title: Great....but
customer_reviews.text: I have had my AOC for only about 2 weeks now and I love it. I have a home build gaming PC that works great with. The screen looks and works great for any desk and looks BEAST! The one complaint the I really started to notice when ever input on High resolution is the quality. Not the best quality..,. But I expect that at the cost of the product. Recommend to anyone looks for a cheap modern for entertainment or just working. If your looking for a better quality widescreen you can always check out the LG model, cost you another $100-150.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: great monitor for the price, not a fan of the anti-glare. Interesting that they put a warning message not to pull off the outer layer. Assuming its the polarizing filter, it is not clean look as the edges don't match up with the actual lcd
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kim

customer_reviews.title: 6 years later and still crushing it.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this monitor for about 6 years now. Working perfectly! No issues at all to report.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this monitor from a 24", 16:9 ratio monitor. I needed a better multitasking space but did not want a multi-monitor setup. Worked great out of the box, and continues to do so. Color and contrast are better than my last monitor, so no complaints there. Widescreen movies also fit the monitor perfectly--you'll probably want to watch your entire movie collection again after getting this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: The best monitor I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor I've ever had. The only issue - the stand is too low. It is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but light popping sound when going into fullscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Good colors, not much lag at all. The only thing is it will make a clicking noise when going into full screen. It also has an external power block. Image is great though!
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro Fuzzy Type - Fixed
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this display was going to have to be returned due to very fuzzy type. A little research turned up an easy fix. The problem is that apple thinks it's a TV and treats it accordingly. Here's a link to the fix: [...] After a week of use I'm very impressed with the quality of the display. Working along side my 15" Macbook Pro it's as if I had three screens.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: AOC is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and monitor were in excellent condition when I received it. I am very pleased with the quality of this monitor and would highly recommend it to anyone that wants an extra wide monitor. It is great for email web-site, as well as, Excel Spreadsheets/ The extra width really is handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now here is a monitor everyone needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor as it has replaced 2 of old one, many reviews complained about dead pixels, no issues here. Has build in speakers and the induced software is a big plus! I am considering another one for office.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 23

customer_reviews.title: The ultra wide view took some getting used to, ...
customer_reviews.text: The ultra wide view took some getting used to, but when you are looking for a second monitor with some real estate the width really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The best 29-in ultra-wide monitor
customer_reviews.text: The ultra wide screen is awesome. I have several makes but the AOC is the best. We just bought another 30 at work because they work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: the color depth palette and multiple options made this monitor a nice blockbuster. And for this price you can not ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is perfectly for design, the color depth palette and multiple options made this monitor a nice blockbuster. And for this price you can not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this monitor so far. The sharpness and colors are spot on. Connected to my Lenovo X1 laptop via HDMI, worked flawlessly. Only issue now is my HD laptop display looks sub-par!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This extra wide monitor has taken my gaming to a new level. Crystal clear gaming,movies,internet. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Glider43

customer_reviews.title: By far the best monitor I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best monitor I've ever owned. I use it for video games mostly, 21:9 on movies, perfect! I can never go back to a traditional monitor now. One thing I will note to users though is that the picture doesn't extend fully to the boarder. The stand is also very very well built, overall I'm really impressed AOC made good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with this monitor, while it has only been a couple of weeks, I can see myself buying another to use at work (plenty of excel columns for me!). The drivers took a bit to find for someone without a CD drive on their PC, but was all good when I did. I could see others complaining that it is not height adjustable, but it wasn't an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Its everything I expected, there is one dead pixel, its tiny and hardly noticeable and off to the right of the screen and not in the center, I plan to use a dead pixel fixer from online.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor for the money! Crystal clear display. Solid base. No dead pixels. My laptop displayed to the wide resolution immediately. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: MannyD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the price tag, Color slightly off but you can live around it. I did find it has some issues when in 3D mode in After Effects.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: punchy, snappy, aesthetic. be advised, you really need dual-link dvi for this.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Certainly worth a look.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of this monitor. Both of the monitors work perfectly. the only thing I dont like is that the bezel is half an inch into the screen, as well as the frame of the whole monitor. AOC does this a lot though, so its expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd F. Duhon II

customer_reviews.title: AOC 29in Q2963PM
customer_reviews.text: great monitor for my pc but doesnt display well for xbox 360 it streches everything tried everything to try to fix it couldnt figure out I may have to change setting in the monitor its self other than that I love this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor. I was worried about the other reviews but I really like the wide screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kawa

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bough one for myself.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and after I saw it, I wanted one for myself. Amazing picture and came in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: On Macbook pro monitor needs HDMI cable, DVI does not work well. Quality and PIP options are awesome. Because of it's width I had to move it farther on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Orcun Tagtekin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile monitor
customer_reviews.text: Usefulness and detail quality are excellent. All that I expected. Better than 2 monitors.
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor Great Color Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing! The colors are great, viewing angle is good and size is awesome. I was a bit worried at first with the 21:9 ratio but i'm impressed. Ive been playing WoW on this screen and its been just perfect. No dead pixels very good back lighting
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hernden

customer_reviews.title: Cool monitor with LOTS of real estate.
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor. Colors are a little darker than I had hoped, but overall it's pretty cool. I use it for both PC and PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chapman

customer_reviews.title: AOC29 in Monitor
customer_reviews.text: If you like to see your webpages on one monitor this is an ideal monitor for that. I can put two webpages on this monitor easily. Or I can bring up different programs and applications. It looks great in my office is like a piece of fine furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie R Hall Jr

customer_reviews.title: Until the right 4K comes along
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful thing, full widescreen display for video. Check out any great piece of film making (like any David Fincher film at 1080p). Extreme contrast, beautiful color. Also great for applications that require a lot of screen real estate, Photoshop, Cubase, Premiere Pro, etc. I'm sure there are already some great 4k monitors available, but they are either too small (32") or too large (55"+) for a desktop display at Ultra HD resolution. A 40" 4K display, with great video quality (unlike the Seiki) under $1000 will no doubt be around this time next year, but this will do until then.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. PIP is unique for a monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. PIP is unique for a monitor. VGA is better than HDMI for resolution, but I am happy so far. The software that sets the grids "Screen+" does not seem to work me so I am thinking of others solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Imjustsayin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I'm totally impressed so far after unboxing and using the monitor for a day. Beautiful colors, very nice contrast and a nice menu full of features. ***I'll check back in a month for a follow up***
customer_reviews.author: lol

customer_reviews.title: this thing is so amazing, so clear
customer_reviews.text: all i have to say about this monitor is .....holy hell.....this thing is so amazing, so clear, such amaze.....oh yeah for certain phones to use the mobile connection they use slimport
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful says it all
customer_reviews.text: I have had this monitor for about three months now. It does everything I have asked without any problems (I'm a gamer). Also the picture is just beautiful I forget it's not real sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: John Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great viewing footprint
customer_reviews.text: Enlarges viewing area to allow several apps to be opened and viewed simultaneously. Monitor sized does not diminish clarity. If I had one concern but not a show stopper is if the desk or table it is placed has any movement the monitor stand allows vibration movement especially of banging the keyboard as many do. But for me this easily cured by stabilizing the work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought two!
customer_reviews.text: So you're shopping around for ultrawide HD monitors and have undoubtedly noticed that this seems to be the best deal going. Congratulations, you can read! The color is fantastic, the sharpness is noticeably crisp and the response time is nice and fluid with no lag. Pair this with a DisplayPort cable if your source supports it and you will never look back. For those of you interested in this for gaming, Skyrim and ESO are breathtaking in 2560x1080. ESO supports the resolution natively while Skyrim will require a little googling to set up, but it was a breeze and works perfectly. DO IT.
customer_reviews.author: DOMINIC ROSARIO

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap daisy chain-able monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap daisy chain-able monitor. If you are not looking to spend mass amounts of money I would recommend this. Sucks that it does not have a versa mount nor the color is as vibrant as monitors from say Dell or Asus, still a good monitor all in all. Love the PIP feature of it, and that you can change the sound based on the PIP. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Probar

customer_reviews.title: Nice resolution, definitely adequate for general office usage
customer_reviews.text: Using it with my Surface tablet at work. Nice resolution, definitely adequate for general office usage.
customer_reviews.author: KT247

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor to replace a 27" 16:9 Samsung. I was apprehensive at first about losing some vertical height due to the different aspect ratio, but it turned out not to bother me much after a day or so. I just wish this type of monitor was available in larger sizes so I could have kept the height of my original monitor and simply gained extra horizontal screen space. This monitor has excellent color depth and nice deep blacks. Some purchasers saw burned out pixels in their monitors, but I haven't seen any on my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: if you un-plug re-plug in it's fine again. like it
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but 1.) the speakers work via HDMI, but not via 3mm jack... oddly, the 3mm in / out parts work ... just no sound using just 3mm in jack. looked for setting etc... nothing. just had it 3 days, and the monitor just fuzzes' out... buttons stop working... if you un-plug re-plug in it's fine again. like it... but it needs to behave... requested a replacement. see picture -> using Side DP as input @ 2560x1080
customer_reviews.author: John Mottershaw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality and the PIP feature. I would buy more of them when the time comes to buy another monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Wu

customer_reviews.title: Not full screen on my 29-inch
customer_reviews.text: My AOC works fine only the screen will not fill up when I use NETFLEX.If anyone can fix it for me they would be a HERO.
customer_reviews.author: William Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Maverick OS broke displayport so now only at 1920x1080!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing, however if you don't hook it up with a displayport cable, then you can't get the full 2560x1080 settings. After upgrading my mac to maverick, I can't even get the monitor to turn on because apple seems to messed up this key feature (displayport) with the new OS release. So I'm back to using the DVI port and stuck at 1920 x 1080, which isn't bad, but I bought this monitor for the pixel real estate... Until Apple releases a fix displayport seems to be dead via thunderbolt port.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fun monitor. Price is great compared to other monitors. A few years ago I purchased an AOC USB monitor and it ran flawless and still does. I just had to have an upgrade and based on my previous experience with this brand, it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for monitor... Amazon service made it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I believe I received a used monitor..!!..Not new..!!..
customer_reviews.text: If not used but possibly returned and then resold as new. Not something I would expect from Amazon. The pieces that came with this unit that were wrapped in plastic were opened and put in additional sealed plastic. The unit came with no registration card and no written manual.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Granke

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It's big enough to watch the movies from my sofa:) and really good quality! Also I like to work on it
customer_reviews.author: Krystsina

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: ditched my tri-24 inch monitor setup for this single 29 and I couldn't be happier with it just from using 24 inch setups for years this was a major step up and for the price it is amazing I have had no issues and have had great experiences with AOC 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Vertical line appeared after just one year of very light use.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! I bought two monitors on January 29, 2014 and today one of them has a vertical line, I tried everything from reseting to factory defaults, resolution etc, but this is a faulty LED display, I barely use this monitor i believe it has less than 30 hours total use, now Amazons warranty does not apply, so basically it is a disposable $400 monitor that only lasts for one year.
customer_reviews.author: ALVARO S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Display!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place programs/apps side by side. Price was right. Fast Amazon shipping and packaged extremely well! Definitely helps me get my work done. I also have my roku player hooked up and the picture quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Drakkon

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size. I can split the screen and have ...
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size. I can split the screen and have multiple documents display in tandem. I have it on an arm, but the stand was really retro. I'd purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Love

customer_reviews.title: A good monitor. I returned it as it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: A good monitor. I returned it as it is a super-wide monitor. I wanted a monitor more like a TV screen.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these screens and so far have had no issues - The image is very crisp - The software that comes with monitor is very useful to manage color schemes and different screen arrangements - The monitors do have and black bezel that is not part of the hardware that does reduce the screen size Overall a great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 21:9 amazing
customer_reviews.text: this monitor its awesome for gaming, i dont see much movies but looks great too, im so happy whit the results i got whit this monitor for my gaming setup.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing monitor very clear no issues for the price you cannot beat this
customer_reviews.author: K. Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this monitor is wonderful, including the price... it does not swivel, which is fine, because I knew it wouldn't swivel when I bought it... it's not 120hz, but then again, I haven't found a ultra-wide ips monitor that is.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: AOC Ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hands down the best monitor I have ever used or laid eyes on. It's has a stunning design and ultra sharp and clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Estes

customer_reviews.title: Hard on the Eyes and Can't Adjust
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, but the clarity leaves much to be desired. It's impossible to adjust the viewing to a comfortable level. Data entry boxes are whitewashed and imperceptible. My eyes hurt and need moisturizer. My guess is this is the most expensive monitor I've ever bought... and the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Don Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose very well...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good monitor where I could get my programs effectively laid out across the screen so that I could do what we do best here in Dilbert-land, in effect multitask. The 21:9 cinematic screen format is perfect for that function. At the price point paid for this monitor I would have expected a more durable feeling frame around the monitor surface itself, but that would be my only ding. The color pallet is very vivid and the resolution excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Norman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on Mac if you use the correct cable
customer_reviews.text: Monitor works fine on my Retina MacBook Pro with a mini display port to regular display port cable at full resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Weintraut

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: THE SCREEN IS NOT 15" HIGH!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is be careful and realize that the dimensions listed (Product Dimensions: 28.1 x 8.4 x 15.3 inches) Are NOT referring to the actual screen, they include the base. I was all excited thinking this monitor was going to be 15" by 28" but it's really only 11" by 28"..... Not that into the monitor, it reminds me exactly of my old one (which I was trying to upgrade from).. Oh well. Live and you learn.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this monitor...smooth, crystal clear picture, no bleed marks. I use it to play Grin Dawn and other RPG's... simply beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright display. Looks amazing with Win 8.1. The only downside is no vertical stand adjustment, other than that I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DL816

customer_reviews.title: As Promised
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price, fast ship. So far several months of use with no problems. Ready to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ton

customer_reviews.title: vertical Red Line Dead Center - Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon for years now and this is the first time I have been motivated to write a review. I bought this monitor expecting it to work. Well it turned on and looked great until about 15 minutes later I noticed a red vertical line directly in the middle of the screen. I tried to contact the manufacturer and they never contacted me back. I waited for 3 days to hear from them. Nothing. I returned it to Amazon and purchased the Dell UltraSharp U2913WM. I would not recommend the AOC unless you like obstructions in the viewing area.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Housley

customer_reviews.title: Unreal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor wowed me right out of the box and as for everything advertised it was more than that after viewing it. You will never have to move any windows around. Very fast shipment to Hawaii will order from this seller again! May be another screen!!!! LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO GLAD I MADE THE INVESTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: The texts look like burned ants after a liquid party
customer_reviews.text: Text is unreadable. Macbook pro users aware. We've tested this monitor on HDMI, miniport with three Macbook Pro Retina Laptops. The texts look like burned ants after a liquid party. We had to pack this again and return to Amazon. Huge time waster.
customer_reviews.author: Borui Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fragile beyond belief.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely while it lasts (although a little disappointing on vertical height). However, if you ever so much as move it once while rearranging your setup, this is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lahiri

customer_reviews.title: This is not a IPS panel, but talking to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a IPS panel, but talking to a AOC tech he affirmed that it is indeed a TFT screen. That is likely so many are having the jagged text issues... Return time for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Confuzed Win User

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply put together and dead/stuck pixels
customer_reviews.text: I know you're really paying for the uncommon aspect ratio but for $500 you would expect a product that would not be so flimsy and cheaply made. On top of that the panel itself had dead/stuck pixels. Unacceptable for the price. Disappointed in AOC, Amazon was great as always though! It's too bad too, I was really looking forward to using this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: AggieJohn2003

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had no problem with it. I just wish it had a remote control, because I like to watch Netflix on it while in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Farmer

product_meta.title: AOC Q2963PM 29-inch IPS (21:9) LED-Lit Monitor, 2560 x 1080 Resolution, 5ms, 50M:1 DCR, VGA / DVI / HDMI (MHL) / Display Port, Speakers, VESA
product_meta.description:
It's a 29" 21:9 cinema concept MNT with AH-IPS Panel, 2560x1080 resolution, 3W stereo speaker with housing for better sound quality and MHL mobile phone connectivity, no more black border at up & button side of screen when you watching a movie.

AMAZON.COM


AOC Q2963PM 29" ULTRAWIDE IPS LED MONITOR
TAKE YOUR WORK AND ENTERTAINMENT EXPERIENCE TO THE NEXT LEVEL
AOC's Q2963PM greatly enhances your productivity and experience; work and leisure won't be the same with features like the ultrawide cinematic screen, screen-splitter function, and dual link-up. Whether it's for viewing multiple documents, a more immersive movie and gaming experience, or multitasking simplicity, the 29" ultrawide 21:9 screen monitor gives you what you need.



KEY FEATURES
 * Panoramic screen with screen-splitter function for multitasking ease
 * Cinematic Screen with 21:9 Aspect Ratio
 * TWHFD 2560 x 1080 resolution @60Hz
 * PBP or PIP multitasking function for enjoying an image from two sources at once
 * Multimedia connectors for VGA, DVI-D with HDCP, HDMI (MHL), DisplayPort
 * Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) to connect and charge the phone
 * IPS Panel with full HD 1080P Resolution and an LED backlit screen

SEE MORE
The AOC 29" UltraWide features an LED Backlit screen that offers brilliant color and ultra clear images. The full HD 1080P Resolution, with 50,000,000:1 contrast ratio and response time of 5ms, creates superior picture sharpness and the In Plane Switching (IPS) Panel allows you to view your spreadsheets or weekend movies from virtually any angle without compromising color uniformity. 

DO MORE
The UltraWide is available for multiple full sized applications as an upgrade to dual monitor settings. Enjoy dual monitor productivity on a single screen. The vast panoramic screen is easy on the eyes, and with the screen-splitter function, multitasking has never been so simple.

EXPERIENCE MORE
The AOC 29" UltraWide screen and equipped dual 3-Watt enclosed speakers deliver a more awesome immersive experience for your favorite movies or games. The narrow bezel frame offers a sleek cinema-like screen experience. The VESA Mount feature is available for wall-mounted cinema experience as well. 

SAVE MORE
The AOC 29" UltraWide is EnergyStar qualified, which means it uses about 30% less energy than standard units. Plus, it has no arsenic in the glass, mercury-free LED, and no BFR/PVC Laminates. It also qualifies for the latest standards such as TCO.

CONNECT MORE
The AOC 29" UltraWide's connectivity is ultra-useful. The HDMI Connections carry high definition picture and sound in one easy cable. The HDMI with MHL allow you to connect your smartphone easily without a network connection. You can stream videos from your phone on to the monitor screen while charging your mobile device at the same time. 

The PIP/PBP Hardware Calibration Ready (Dual Link-Up) allow two devices to be viewed on the monitor simultaneously. The DisplayPort connection allows you to connect several monitors to your notebook with one simple cable. 

Connect your smartphone with one cable. View two devices simultaneously. 



Use DisplayPort 1.2 cable to Daisy Chain monitors using just one cable to the PC. 
View larger. 
TECH SPECIFICATIONS
 * Viewable Image Size: 29"
 * Aspect Ratio: 21:9
 * Panel: LED AH-IPS
 * Brightness: 300 cd/m2
 * Contrast Ratio: 50,000,000:1
 * View Angle: 178° horizontal, 178° vertical
 * Optimum Resolution: 2560 x 1080 @ 60Hz
 * Colors Supported: 16.7 Million
 * Input/OutputS: VGA x 1, DVI-D x 1, DP-in x 1, DP-out x 1, HDMI x 1(MHL), Audio in/out x 1
 * Built-in Speakers: 3 Watts x 2
 * Windows 8 Compatible: Yes
 * Wall Mountable: Yes 

MORE INFO
View larger.
feature_bullets: 29" cinematic display area with IPS technology, 21:9 Ultrawide Aspect Ratio, 300 cd/m2 Brightness
2560 x 1080 Full HD resolution, 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio, 5ms Response Time
VGA, DVI-D HDCP, HDMI (MHL), Display Port connectivity, 2 built-in 3W stereo speakers
PBP/PIP multi-tasking function, VESA wall-mount compliant
LED backlit, Energy Star qualified for 30% less energy usage
